features: Pertex Quantum® fabric is designed to protect from wind and improve the efficiency of insulation
3D WarmCube™ construction prevents down fill from shifting and traps heat in the surrounding air channels for maximum warmth and performance
Fixed hood with hidden adjustable front opening
Materials: Pertex Quantum© 100% Recycled Nylon Mini Ripstop Y-Shape 1.0 oz/ yd
Insulation: 120g PrimaLoft® Silver Hi-Loft and 120g Recycled Thinsulate Featherless with WarmCube™ construction.
